reviews.name: Best version out there, THANK YOU CAPCOM!!!
reviews.title: Best version out there, THANK YOU CAPCOM!!!
reviews.text: This is my first review, but I knew this one would be positive. I love this game, and I play it more than the second and heroes versions. This game is a simple and calm game, yet it brings me much joy. My little brother, me, and my dad all play it. Great game. THANK YOU CAPCOM!!!

reviews.name: Wasted time on a gem?
reviews.title: Wasted time on a gem?
reviews.text: Years ago, I spent over 50 hours to 100% this game. All achievements, zen garden, minigames, etc.. Afterwards, I deleted the app since I was done with it. Now I‚Äôve redownloaded it and regret doing that, I‚Äôve lost everything. There should be save data backups for a game of this caliber.

reviews.name: Is This Even Legal?!?!
reviews.title: Is This Even Legal?!?!
reviews.text: How can a game I‚Äôve owned for years suddenly undo all of my IAPs and turn itself into a free to pay piece of scam work that cancels out what money I‚Äôve spent & items I‚Äôve unlocked? Where‚Äôs my refund when all that‚Äôs left is 1 giant ad of a game? If doing that works one way then it should work both ways & give back every cent to anyone who bought the full version before this crooked EA, the DJT of the gaming world, took over. One does not earn the Most Hated Company in America title easily. Never EVER give a cent to an EA game because they can & will & HAVE stolen what we once owned. Literally bought & owned this game and now do not. That‚Äôs sickening. How is that even a viable long-term model? It‚Äôs like if garbage morphed into game developer form.A year later: reinstalled.  Still getting ads, still no restore option.    Typical EA.

reviews.name: What have they done here!?
reviews.title: What have they done here!?
reviews.text: So I decided to get the game again to play it again since I liked the game a few years ago, but now it‚Äôs just wrong. For some reason there are adds everywhere, random promotional stuff all over the place you can‚Äôt turn off, more clicks for more adds, it‚Äôs disgusting. It completely breaks the game loop to suddenly have a 30 second add in the middle of it. Maybe you can get rid of all of them in the store once you unlock it, but until then you have to go through this abomination. The sounds also broken in a lot of places for some reason. Another property EA couldn‚Äôt care less about other than for money. Disgusting.

reviews.name: More ads than games
reviews.title: More ads than games
reviews.text: This used to be a favorite, but now it has so many ads that 5 minutes of play interrupted by 4 or 5 ads. I‚Äôm okay wwith ads that I choose to watch for some benefit in-game, but they literally have ads before and after (and sometimes during) each level‚Ä¶and the only benefit is that you n keep playing? No thanks, when there are plenty of other games out there.Yuck to a previously fun game.
